name: Catan: Console Edition
summary: Catan – Console Edition is a video game version of the classic strategy board game from Dovetail Games and Nomad Games, and it’s coming to PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S in 2023. The game will have an online component with skill-based matchmaking, as well as allowing a local setup that discourages cheating.

videos.name: Announcement Trailer
videos.title: CATAN - Console Edition Announce Trailer | Coming 2023!
